# About the App

NHSquicker is a free app which provides live wait time information for NHS services in Devon, Cornwall and Somerset. It was developed to improve patient access to NHS services by providing a reliable, easy-to-use platform to manage healthcare needs.

![](images/Screenshot%202025-11-19%20135329.png){style="display:block; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto;" width="600"}

#### What the App Does

The app has multiple features, including:

-   View live wait times

-   Find alternative services, such as GP and pharmacies

-   Access information on health conditions and treatments
